speaker: Kenji Kanazawa
title: Get started with Reinforcement Learning on Azure Machine Learning
description:
Are you curious how data scientists and researchers train agents that make decisions?  Learn how to use reinforcement learning to optimize decision making using Azure Machine Learning.  We show you how to get started.

Jump To: 
[00:36] - What is reinforcement learning?
[01:37] – How do reinforcement learning algorithms work?
[04:10] – Reinforcement Learning on Azure – Notebook sample
[05:17] – Reinforcement Learning Estimator
[07:21] – Sample training Python script
[09:06] – Training Result
[10:15] – What kind of problems can you solve with reinforcement learning?
